@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes It's so deeply insulting. I'm not going to dignify it.
The politics of strife. #twitter
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes You don't believe that. You wouldn't follow me if you thought that.
@TWrecksReturns Watch your mouth.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes You should think about that.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes You apply an ideological and/or racial lens to most of your arguments. The world is far more complex.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes Our immigration "ban" policy and trying to thwart online radicalization are separate but related issues.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes How many white Americans were arrested and charged in 2016 for clouding with ISIS? Get back to me on that.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes Ed, you keep moving the goal posts. How many of those acts were carried out by refugees? Simple question.
@EdAsante77 @chrislhayes Come on. If I didn't, I could google it. That's not the point. It's a religious test. Full stop.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes This wrongheaded policy is a trumped-up solution in search of a problem -- a problem we've addressed.
@EdAsante77 @yajur @chrislhayes Dude, this isn't Europe. For several reasons that comparison is a fail.
@EdAsante77 @chrislhayes So you at least admit this is about Islam to assuage Trump voters and not some phony travel ban?
@EdAsante77 @chrislhayes Who/when was the last "jihad" from one of these countries to commit terrorism here?
@EdAsante77 @chrislhayes Last refugee to commit an act of terrorism on American soil was Cuban.
@chrislhayes All white Lives Matter, Chris. Come on, bruh.

@LizMair A more plausible argument is, this pick resets the court back to pre-Scalia. Keep your powder dry for the next radical pick.
@LizMair The politics are more complicated than that. Just within the past two weeks alone the ground has shifted on the left.
